com.complexible.common.netty.codec.http
Class ByteBufHttpOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      com.complexible.common.netty.codec.http.ByteBufHttpOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable
public final class ByteBufHttpOutputStream
extends OutputStream

An implementation of OutputStream that wraps a Netty ChannelHandlerContext. The contents of the OutputStream are written to a ByteBuf in the order in which they are received, and then written out to the channel and flushed when a pre-defined size has been reached, or the stream is closed Chunks of content are written as HTTP payloads (HttpContent). The stream *must* be closed in order to send the EOF signal to the consumer.

Since:
2.0
Version:
2.0
Author:
Stephen Nowell, Michael Grove
